title: Laptop penetration in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.
Percentage of population is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 66.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 47.0 was reported at Year 2009
